name: Birdquest: A Birdwatching Simulation Experience
description:
This is something of a demo. Full game to come? Perchance someday. 

Controls:

Left, Right, and Up arrows to move. 

Down arrow to enter bird identification mode. Type the bird's name into the box! 

CTRL to bring up the field guide. 

Future change wishlist:

  • Fix auto-select for text box to be less temperamental.
  • Add notifications on successful bird identification. 
  • Stop animation from getting stuck on jump when free-fall state is not entered. 
  • More levels with different birds?
  • Original Soundtrack 

Art sources:

Jungle Birds by chariat

Free Jungle Asset Pack by Jesse M

Paper GUI Pack by crusenho
